Burn.help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.

Vengeance.help: The loss of a good leader enrage the team. If a Officer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
Vengeance.targetHelp: The loss of a good leader enrage the team. If a Officer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
Vengeance.victimHit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.
